### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE project_progress (task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
                    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
                    assigned_to VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
                    deadline DATE,
                    completion_status BOOLEAN)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE project_progress SET completion_status = TRUE WHERE task_id = 1;
